thread.title: Herman Miller Schedules First Quarter Fiscal 2016 Conference Call and Webcast
thread.title_full: Herman Miller Schedules First Quarter Fiscal 2016 Conference Call and Webcast

author: admin
title: Herman Miller Schedules First Quarter Fiscal 2016 Conference Call and Webcast
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Herman Miller, Inc. 
ZEELAND, Mich., Sept. 4, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Herman Miller, Inc. (NASDAQ: MLHR) today announced that the company will host its first quarter fiscal 2016 conference call and webcast on Thursday, September 17, 2015 at 9:30 a.m. ET. 
The conference call will be webcast live with streaming audio at http://www.hermanmiller.com/about-us/investors.html . An archived copy will be available on Herman Miller's website shortly following the call. The conference call can also be accessed by dialing (877) 363-5046. 
The financial earnings news release will be issued on Wednesday, September 16, 2015 after the market closes. Additional links to materials supporting the release will be also available at http://www.hermanmiller.com/about-us/investors.html . 
About Herman Miller Herman Miller's inspiring designs, inventive technologies, and strategic services help people do great things and organizations perform at their best. The company's award-winning products and services generated approximately $2.1 billion in revenue in fiscal 2015. A past recipient of the Smithsonian Institution's Cooper Hewitt National Design Award, Herman Miller designs can be found in the permanent collections of museums worldwide. Innovative business practices and a commitment to social responsibility have also helped establish Herman Miller as a recognized global leader. Herman Miller maintains the Human Rights Campaign Foundation's top rating in its annual Corporate Equality Index and was named among the 50 Best U.S. Manufacturers by Industry Week in 2014. Herman Miller is included in the Dow Jones Sustainability World Index and trades on the NASDAQ Global Select Market under the symbol MLHR. 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/herman-miller-schedules-first-quarter-fiscal-2016-conference-call-and-webcast-300138228.html 
SOURCE Herman Miller, Inc.
